titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunches should provide optional meatless meals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that federally funded school lunch programs should provide nutritious non-meat meals for students who conscientiously believe such meals to be best for themselves.
